description.en: This data is is based on Household Income Surveys (HIS) and Household Income & Expenditure Surveys (HIES) carried out from 1970 to 2022, the latest of which is HIES 2022. The survey is carried out at least twice in a rolling five-year period to produce representative data regarding income, poverty and access to basic amenities for Malaysian households.
description.bm: Data ini dihasilkan berdasarkan Survei Pendapatan Isi Rumah (HIS) serta Survei Pendapatan dan Perbelanjaan Isi Rumah (HIES) yang dilaksanakan dari tahun 1970 ke 2022, dengan survei yang terkini dilaksanakan pada tahun 2022. Survei itu dilaksanakan dua kali dalam tempoh lima tahun bagi tujuan menghasilkan data pendapatan, kemiskinan dan akses kepada kemudahan asas bagi isi rumah warganegara.

variables.name: date
variables.desc_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with DD set to 01
variables.desc_bm: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan DD diberi nilai 01

variables.name: state
variables.desc_en: [Categorical] Name of the state (16 in total) or Malaysia

variables.name: breakdown
variables.desc_en: [String] Specific ethnic or geographic subgroup, only available at national level
variables.desc_bm: [Rentetan] Pecahan mengikut kumpulan etnik atau geografi, tetapi hanya di peringkat nasional

variables.name: n_households
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Number of households for the period of the survey
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Bilangan isi rumah semasa tempoh survei dilaksanakan

variables.name: gini
variables.desc_en: [Float] Gini coefficient (between 0 and 1), where 0 represents perfect equality
variables.desc_bm: [Apung] Pekali Gini (antara 0 dan 1), di mana 0 ditafsirkan sebagai paling saksama

en.methodology: This data is is based on Household Income Surveys (HIS) and Household Income & Expenditure Surveys (HIES) carried out from 1970 to 2022, the latest of which is HIES 2022. The survey is carried out at least twice in a rolling five-year period to produce representative data regarding income, poverty and access to basic amenities for Malaysian households.
en.caveat: For a full account of the relative standard errors for the survey as well as the detailed survey methodology, please refer to the [HIES Technical Notes](https://google.com).

bm.methodology: Data ini dihasilkan berdasarkan Survei Pendapatan Isi Rumah (HIS) serta Survei Pendapatan dan Perbelanjaan Isi Rumah (HIES) yang dilaksanakan dari tahun 1970 ke 2022, dengan survei yang terkini dilaksanakan pada tahun 2022. Survei itu dilaksanakan dua kali dalam tempoh lima tahun bagi tujuan menghasilkan data pendapatan, kemiskinan dan akses kepada kemudahan asas bagi isi rumah warganegara.
bm.caveat: Untuk mendapat butiran penuh tentang ralat piawai survei serta metodologi yang terperinci, sila rujuk kepada [Nota Teknikal HIES](https://google.com).
bm.publication: [Laporan Survei Pendapatan dan Perbelanjaan Isi Rumah, 2022](https://www.dosm.gov.my/v1/index.php?r=column/pdfPrev&id=TU00TmRhQ1N5TUxHVWN0T2VjbXJYZz09).
